title: GBoard "hide arrow" on gesture navigation mode overlays other apps when it should be hidden.
content:
Hey,

I've got a Problem with GBoard since i switched to gesture navgiation a few weeks back.

The arrow to hide/collapse GBoard is always showing when it should not.
For Example looking at a picture in Telegram, the arrow is still there and blocks all touch inputs in that area.
I noticed the arrow even on my lockscreen.

Please help
